about_the_game:
Welcome to World Titans War!


The game where you create your own destiny in a world at war filled with action and adventure. Customize your avatar however you want, from hairstyles to facial expressions, and be unique! Develop skills to make life in this world more comfortable and challenge your limits.

Explore the entire map in search of areas you can raid and get valuable resources. Cities, towns, mines, quarries, military bases, and strategic zones, they all have something to offer! Complete missions to help your clan survive the war, earn their friendship, and get rewards.

Build your own base, either with blueprints you find on the map, modular construction, or just taking over any house you see. The limit of construction is in your imagination! Make objects to improve your camps, trade with merchants to get Titan Coins, and create a clan to sow chaos with your friends.

Control different vehicles, such as tanks, planes, trucks, and classic cars, to move around the map and crush your enemies. Choose a side and enlist in the military race, complete missions, and increase your rank until you become a General. Organize and fight alongside your allies to conquer flags, build camps, and fortify the zones under your control!

In World Titans War, you set the limit. Are you ready to survive and thrive in this war-torn world?

Join now and create your own story!
detailed_description:
Welcome to World Titans War!


The game where you create your own destiny in a world at war filled with action and adventure. Customize your avatar however you want, from hairstyles to facial expressions, and be unique! Develop skills to make life in this world more comfortable and challenge your limits.

Explore the entire map in search of areas you can raid and get valuable resources. Cities, towns, mines, quarries, military bases, and strategic zones, they all have something to offer! Complete missions to help your clan survive the war, earn their friendship, and get rewards.

Build your own base, either with blueprints you find on the map, modular construction, or just taking over any house you see. The limit of construction is in your imagination! Make objects to improve your camps, trade with merchants to get Titan Coins, and create a clan to sow chaos with your friends.

Control different vehicles, such as tanks, planes, trucks, and classic cars, to move around the map and crush your enemies. Choose a side and enlist in the military race, complete missions, and increase your rank until you become a General. Organize and fight alongside your allies to conquer flags, build camps, and fortify the zones under your control!

In World Titans War, you set the limit. Are you ready to survive and thrive in this war-torn world?

Join now and create your own story!

name: World Titans War

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 950 / AMD Radeon Pro WX 5100
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 87 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770K / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 87 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD

reviews:
“I have had and am lucky to be a beta tester of this great project. What this game is going to bring us is unique. What do you want to play civilian?”
Okymur

“This game is kinda like a dayz cross ww2 game WITHOUT STUPID ZOMBIES. DON'T believe the bad reviews, is it a learning curve? yes, does it need work? what early access doesn't? the big question is it fun to play 100%..”
Seriousoggamer

“Fun game play but there is a steep learning curve. Much needs to be improved with crafting and recipes. Also not a big fan of loosing all of my inventory every time I die. This has been the way most survival games work lately but I don't like working for hours just to loose it all if/when I can't get back to where I died. Positives are the missions and vendors scattered around the map. Would be nice if their location was marked. Guns and ammo are very easy to get. Much better than other games.”
badd455
short_description: Immerse yourself in an epic survival experience in WW2! You'll have the chance to choose your path: will you be a civilian surviving in a war-torn world, or a military strategist leading your troops to victory? Get ready for an intense and exciting gameplay experience! Play now!
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, German, Portuguese - Portugal
*languages with full audio support
